name: @miner-org/mineflayer-bot-war

scripts.git-update: git add . && git commit -m "my butt hurts" && git push
scripts.npm-publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
scripts.npm-publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
scripts.npm-publish-major: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
scripts.update-all-patch: npm run git-update && npm run npm-publish-patch
scripts.update-all-minor: npm run git-update && npm run npm-publish-minor
scripts.update-all-major: npm run git-update && npm run npm-publish-major

author: Ash
description: A mineflayer plugin for the java plugin bot-war
